comment:
/**
 * MenuV library
 * @name MenuV
 * @alias MenuV
 * @class MenuV
 * @namespace MenuV
 */
name: MenuV

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Close a menu * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {MenuV} MenuV * @param {Menu|string} menu Menu or Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) * @param {function} [callback] Trigger callback when function has been executed * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * MenuV:CloseMenu(menu) * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * MenuV:CloseMenu(menu, function() * print('Menu closed :(') * end) */
$members.description: Type: `function` Close a menu

params.description: Trigger callback when function has been executed
params.name: callback

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')MenuV:CloseMenu(menu)

local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')MenuV:CloseMenu(menu, function()   print('Menu closed :(')end)
$members.name: CloseMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Create a `MenuV` menu * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {MenuV} MenuV * @param {string|boolean} [title='MenuV'] * Title that appears on the big banner. * @param {string} [subtitle=''] * Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar. * @param {string} [position='topleft'] * Menu position on screen * * * options: * * `topleft` | `topcenter` | `topright` | `centerleft` | `center` | `centerright` | `bottomleft` | `bottomcenter` | `bottomright` * @param {number} [r=0] * Primary color RGB red channel [0-255] * @param {number} [g=0] * Primary color RGB green channel [0-255] * @param {number} [b=255] * Primary color RGB blue channel [0-255] * @param {string} [size='size-110'] * Menu size in % * * * options: * * `size-100` | `size-110` | `size-125` | `size-150` | `size-175` | `size-200` * @param {string} [texture='default'] * Texture name for the banner image * @param {string} [dictionary='menuv'] * Texture dictionary name for the banner image * @param {string} [namespace='unknown'] * Namespace is required to set keybinds, make sure given namespace is unique for every menu. * @param {string} [theme='default'] * Change the look of the menu, available options: `default` and `native` * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0) * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace') * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * @returns {Menu} */
$members.description: Type: `function` Create a `MenuV` menu

params.description: Title that appears on the big banner.
params.name: title

params.description: Subtitle that appears in capital letters in a small black bar.
params.name: subtitle

params.description: Texture name for the banner image
params.name: texture

params.description: Texture dictionary name for the banner image
params.name: dictionary

params.description: Namespace is required to set keybinds, make sure given namespace is unique for every menu.
params.name: namespace

params.description: Change the look of the menu, available options: `default` and `native`
params.name: theme

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0)
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace')
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')
$members.name: CreateMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Returns created menu matching `UUID` * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {MenuV} MenuV * @param {string} uuid Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) * @example * local menu = MenuV:GetMenu('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') * @returns {Menu|null} Returns matching menu or `nil` */
$members.description: Type: `function` Returns created menu matching `UUID`
$members.name: GetMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Create a new menu from properties of this one (without items and events) * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {MenuV} MenuV * @param {Menu} menu Menu to take properties from * @param {table} overrides A table with key values to override, see {@link #Menu~options|Menu options} * @param {string} namespace Unique namespace, see {@link #Menu.Namespace|Menu.Namespace} * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local menu2 = MenuV:InheritMenu(menu, { title = 'Menu V2', subtitle = 'Welcome to MenuV2 :D', theme = 'default' }) * @returns {Menu} - New menu with properties of this one */
$members.description: Type: `function` Create a new menu from properties of this one (without items and events)

params.description: A table with key values to override, see {@link #Menu~options|Menu options}
params.name: overrides

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local menu2 = MenuV:InheritMenu(menu, { title = 'Menu V2', subtitle = 'Welcome to MenuV2 :D', theme = 'default' })

returns.description: - New menu with properties of this one

$members.name: InheritMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Checks if namespace is available * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {string} namespace Namespace, see {@link #Menu.Namespace|Menu.Namespace} * @example * local available = MenuV:IsNamespaceAvailable('example_namespace') * @returns {boolean} Return `true` if given namespace is available, otherwise `false` */
$members.description: Type: `function` Checks if namespace is available
examples: local available = MenuV:IsNamespaceAvailable('example_namespace')

returns.description: Return `true` if given namespace is available, otherwise `false`

$members.name: IsNamespaceAvailable

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Open a menu * @memberof MenuV * @access public * @param {MenuV} MenuV * @param {Menu|string} menu Menu or Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) * @param {function} [callback] Trigger callback when function has been executed * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * MenuV:OpenMenu(menu) * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * MenuV:OpenMenu(menu, function() * print('Menu is now open :D') * end) */
$members.description: Type: `function` Open a menu

params.description: Trigger callback when function has been executed
params.name: callback

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')MenuV:OpenMenu(menu)

local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')MenuV:OpenMenu(menu, function()   print('Menu is now open :D')end)
$members.name: OpenMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item becomes active/selected in NUI * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#enter * @param {Item} item Current active/selected item * @example item:On('enter', function(item) print('You have entered this item :)') end) */
$members.name: enter
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item becomes active/selected in NUI

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item becomes inactive/unselected in NUI * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#leave * @param {Item} item Current inactive/unselected item * @example item:On('leave', function(item) print('You have unselected this item :(') end) */
$members.name: leave
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item becomes inactive/unselected in NUI

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when user pressed `ENTER` on item * @memberof ButtonItem * @access public * @this ButtonItem * @event ButtonItem#select * @param {ButtonItem} item Current selected item * @example item:On('select', function(item) print('You have updated this item :)') end) */
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when user pressed `ENTER` on item
$members.name: select

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item's value changed * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#update * @param {Item} item Current updated item * @param {string} key Current updated key * @param {any} value Current updated value * @param {any} oldValue Previous value * @example item:On('update', function(item, key, value, oldValue) print('You have updated this item :)') end) */
$members.name: update
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item's value changed
Type: `boolean` Value of {@link #CheckboxItem|CheckboxItem}
$members.name: Value

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when user changed checkbox state * @memberof CheckboxItem * @access public * @this CheckboxItem * @event CheckboxItem#change * @param {CheckboxItem} item Current changed checkbox item * @param {boolean} newValue New state of checkbox * @param {boolean} oldValue Previous state of checkbox * @example item:On('change', function(item, newValue, oldValue) print('You have changed them checkbox state :)') end) */
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when user changed checkbox state
$members.name: change

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when user check the checkbox * @memberof CheckboxItem * @access public * @this CheckboxItem * @event CheckboxItem#check * @param {CheckboxItem} item Current checked checkbox item * @example item:On('check', function(item) print('You have set the checkbox state to checked :D') end) */
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when user check the checkbox
$members.name: check

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item becomes active/selected in NUI * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#enter * @param {Item} item Current active/selected item * @example item:On('enter', function(item) print('You have entered this item :)') end) */
$members.name: enter
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item becomes active/selected in NUI

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item becomes inactive/unselected in NUI * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#leave * @param {Item} item Current inactive/unselected item * @example item:On('leave', function(item) print('You have unselected this item :(') end) */
$members.name: leave
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item becomes inactive/unselected in NUI

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when user uncheck the checkbox * @memberof CheckboxItem * @access public * @this CheckboxItem * @event CheckboxItem#uncheck * @param {CheckboxItem} item Current unchecked checkbox item * @example item:On('uncheck', function(item) print('You have set the checkbox state to unchecked :(') end) */
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when user uncheck the checkbox
$members.name: uncheck

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item's value changed * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#update * @param {Item} item Current updated item * @param {string} key Current updated key * @param {any} value Current updated value * @param {any} oldValue Previous value * @example item:On('update', function(item, key, value, oldValue) print('You have updated this item :)') end) */
$members.name: update
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item's value changed

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Confirm this item, set confirm state to `true` * @memberof ConfirmItem * @access public */
$members.description: Type: `function` Confirm this item, set confirm state to `true`
$members.name: Confirm

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Deny this item, set confirm state to `false` * @memberof ConfirmItem * @access public */
$members.description: Type: `function` Deny this item, set confirm state to `false`

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when user changed confirm state * @memberof ConfirmItem * @access public * @this ConfirmItem * @event ConfirmItem#change * @param {ConfirmItem} item Current changed confirm item * @param {boolean} newValue New state of confirm * @param {boolean} oldValue Previous state of confirm * @example item:On('change', function(item, newValue, oldValue) print('You have changed them confirm state :)') end) */

$members.name: leave

$members.name: update

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Returns the {@link #Menu|Menu} where item is added to (Parent Menu) * @memberof Item * @access public * @this Item * @param {Item} item {@link #Item|Item} to get parent menu from * @returns {Menu} Parent's menu */
$members.description: Type: `function` Returns the {@link #Menu|Menu} where item is added to (Parent Menu)
$members.name: GetParentMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Get current item's value with some validation, see {@link #Item.Value|Item.Value} * @memberof Item * @access public * @this Item * @param {Item} item {@link #Item|Item} to get value from * @returns {any|nil} Return current valid value or `nil` */
$members.description: Type: `function` Get current item's value with some validation, see {@link #Item.Value|Item.Value}
$members.name: GetValue

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Register a function as `on` event trigger * @memberof Item * @access public * @this Item * @param {Item} item {@link #Item|Item} to register function for * @param {string} event Name of `on` event to trigger * @param {function} func Function to trigger */
$members.description: Type: `function` Register a function as `on` event trigger
$members.name: On

$members.description: Type: `string` Description of menu item

$members.description: Type: `boolean` When item value changed, force to save changes

$members.description: Type: `string` Universally Unique Identifier (UUID)
$members.name: UUID

$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item becomes active/selected in NUI

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * This function will add a button item to {@link #Menu|Menu} * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to add `button` for * @param {table} [options={}] * Button information * @param {string} [options.icon=''] * Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org} * @param {string} [options.label=''] * Label on button * @param {string} [options.description=''] * Button description when this button is active * @param {any|Menu} [options.value=nil] * Button menu value, when value is a {@link #Menu|Menu}, MenuV will open that {@link #Menu|Menu} on button select * @param {boolean} [options.disabled=false] * When this option is `true`, button isn't selectable anymore * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local button = menu:AddButton({ icon = '', label = 'Example Button', value = 10, description = 'Example button' }) * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * local menu2 = menu:InheritMenu({title = 'MenuV 2.0', subtitle = 'Inherit menu of `menu`', theme = 'default' }) * * local button = menu:AddButton({ icon = '', label = 'Open Menu2', value = menu2, description = 'Open menu 2.0' }) * @returns {ButtonItem} - New button item */
$members.description: Type: `function` This function will add a button item to {@link #Menu|Menu}

params.description: Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org}
params.name: options.icon

params.description: Button description when this button is active
params.name: options.description

params.description: Button menu value, when value is a {@link #Menu|Menu}, MenuV will open that {@link #Menu|Menu} on button select
params.name: options.value

params.description: When this option is `true`, button isn't selectable anymore
params.name: options.disabled

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local button = menu:AddButton({ icon = '', label = 'Example Button', value = 10, description = 'Example button' })

local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local menu2 = menu:InheritMenu({title = 'MenuV 2.0', subtitle = 'Inherit menu of `menu`', theme = 'default' })local button = menu:AddButton({ icon = '', label = 'Open Menu2', value = menu2, description = 'Open menu 2.0' })
$members.name: AddButton

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * This function will add a checkbox item to {@link #Menu|Menu} * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to add `checkbox` item for * @param {table} [options={}] * Checkbox information * @param {string} [options.icon=''] * Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org} * @param {string} [options.label=''] * Label on checkbox * @param {string} [options.description=''] * Checkbox description when this checkbox item is active * @param {boolean} [options.value=false] * Checkbox item value * @param {boolean} [options.disabled=false] * When this option is `true`, checkbox isn't selectable anymore * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local checkbox = menu:AddCheckbox({ icon = '', label = 'Checkbox Example', value = false }) * @returns {CheckboxItem} - New checkbox item */
$members.description: Type: `function` This function will add a checkbox item to {@link #Menu|Menu}

params.description: Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org}
params.name: options.icon

params.description: Checkbox description when this checkbox item is active
params.name: options.description

params.description: When this option is `true`, checkbox isn't selectable anymore
params.name: options.disabled

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local checkbox = menu:AddCheckbox({ icon = '', label = 'Checkbox Example', value = false })
$members.name: AddCheckbox

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * This function will add a confirm item to {@link #Menu|Menu} * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to add `confirm` item for * @param {table} [options={}] * Confirm information * @param {string} [options.icon=''] * Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org} * @param {string} [options.label=''] * Label on confirm item * @param {string} [options.description=''] * Confirm description when this confirm item is active * @param {boolean} [options.value=false] * Confirm menu value * @param {boolean} [options.disabled=false] * When this option is `true`, confirm item isn't selectable anymore * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local confirm = menu:AddConfirm({ icon = '', label = 'Example Confirm', value = false }) * @returns {ConfirmItem} - New confirm item */
$members.description: Type: `function` This function will add a confirm item to {@link #Menu|Menu}

params.description: Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org}
params.name: options.icon

params.description: Confirm description when this confirm item is active
params.name: options.description

params.description: When this option is `true`, confirm item isn't selectable anymore
params.name: options.disabled

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local confirm = menu:AddConfirm({ icon = '', label = 'Example Confirm', value = false })
$members.name: AddConfirm

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * This function will add a range item to {@link #Menu|Menu} * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to add `range` item for * @param {table} [options={}] * Range information * @param {string} [options.icon=''] * Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org} * @param {string} [options.label=''] * Label on range item * @param {string} [options.description=''] * Range item description when this range item is active * @param {number} [options.value=0] * Range item value * @param {number} [options.min=0] * Minimal range value * @param {number} [options.max=0] * Maximal range value * @param {boolean} [options.disabled=false] * When this option is `true`, range item isn't selectable anymore * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local range = menu:AddRange({ icon = '', label = 'Example Range Item', min = 0, max = 10, value = 0, saveOnUpdate = true }) * @returns {RangeItem} - New range item */
$members.description: Type: `function` This function will add a range item to {@link #Menu|Menu}

params.description: Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org}
params.name: options.icon

params.description: Range item description when this range item is active
params.name: options.description

params.description: When this option is `true`, range item isn't selectable anymore
params.name: options.disabled

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local range = menu:AddRange({ icon = '', label = 'Example Range Item', min = 0, max = 10, value = 0, saveOnUpdate = true })
$members.name: AddRange

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * This function will add a slider item to {@link #Menu|Menu} * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to add `slider` for * @param {table} [options={}] * Slider information * @param {string} [options.icon=''] * Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org} * @param {string} [options.label=''] * Label on slider * @param {string} [options.description=''] * Slider description when this slider is active * @param {number} [options.value=1] * Slider menu value, must be a valid index of {@link #SliderItem.Values|SliderItem.Values} * @param {table} [options.values=[]] * List of values * @param {string} [value.label='Value'] * Label of value item * @param {string} [value.description=''] * Description of value item * @param {any} [value.value=null] * Value of value item * @param {boolean} [options.disabled=false] * When this option is `true`, slider isn't selectable anymore * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local slider = menu:AddSlider({ icon = '', label = 'Example Slider', value = 'demo', values = { { label = 'Demo Item', value = 'demo', description = 'Demo Item 1' }, { label = 'Demo Item 2', value = 'demo2', description = 'Demo Item 2' }, { label = 'Demo Item 3', value = 'demo3', description = 'Demo Item 3' }, { label = 'Demo Item 4', value = 'demo4', description = 'Demo Item 4' } }}) * @returns {SliderItem} - New slider item */
$members.description: Type: `function` This function will add a slider item to {@link #Menu|Menu}

params.description: Emoji as item prefex, see {@link https://emojipedia.org/|emojipedia.org}
params.name: options.icon

params.description: Slider description when this slider is active
params.name: options.description

params.description: Slider menu value, must be a valid index of {@link #SliderItem.Values|SliderItem.Values}
params.name: options.value

params.description: When this option is `true`, slider isn't selectable anymore
params.name: options.disabled

$members.name: AddSlider

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Clear all items in menu * @memberof Menu * @access public * @param {Menu} menu Menu * @param {boolean} [update=true] Force NUI update * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:ClearItems() * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:ClearItems(false) */
$members.description: Type: `function` Clear all items in menu
examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:ClearItems()
local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:ClearItems(false)
$members.name: ClearItems

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Close this menu * @memberof Menu * @access public * @param {Menu} menu Menu * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:Close() */
$members.description: Type: `function` Close this menu
examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:Close()
$members.name: Close

$members.comment:
/**
     * Create a new menu from properties of this one (without items and events)
     * @memberof Menu
     * @access public
     * @param {Menu} menu Menu
     * @param {table} overrides A table with key values to override, see {@link #Menu~options|Menu options}
     * @param {string} namespace Unique namespace, see {@link #Menu.Namespace|Menu.Namespace}
     * @example
     * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')
     * 
     * local menu2 = menu:InheritMenu({title = 'MenuV 2.0', subtitle = 'Inherit menu of `menu`', theme = 'default' })
     * @returns {Menu} - New menu with properties of this one
     */
$members.description: Create a new menu from properties of this one (without items and events)

params.description: A table with key values to override, see {@link #Menu~options|Menu options}
params.name: overrides

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local menu2 = menu:InheritMenu({title = 'MenuV 2.0', subtitle = 'Inherit menu of `menu`', theme = 'default' })

returns.description: - New menu with properties of this one

$members.name: InheritMenu

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Register a function as `on` event trigger * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to register function for * @param {string} event Name of `on` event to trigger * @param {function} func Function to trigger * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:On('open', function(m) * print('Menu is now open :D') * end) * @returns {string} Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) */
$members.description: Type: `function` Register a function as `on` event trigger
examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:On('open', function(m)   print('Menu is now open :D')end)
$members.name: On

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Open this menu * @memberof Menu * @access public * @param {Menu} menu Menu * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:Open() */
$members.description: Type: `function` Open this menu
examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:Open()
$members.name: Open

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Register keybind for opening this menu, a unqiue {@link #Menu.Namespace|Menu.Namespace} is required * @memberof Menu * @access public * @param {Menu} menu Menu * @param {string} defaultType Default input type, like: KEYBOARD, MOUSE_BUTTON etc. * @param {string} defaultKey Default input button, like: E, F12, LEFT_BUTTON etc. * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:OpenWith('keyboard', 'F1') */
$members.description: Type: `function` Register keybind for opening this menu, a unqiue {@link #Menu.Namespace|Menu.Namespace} is required

params.description: Default input type, like: KEYBOARD, MOUSE_BUTTON etc.
params.name: defaultType

params.description: Default input button, like: E, F12, LEFT_BUTTON etc.
params.name: defaultKey

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')menu:OpenWith('keyboard', 'F1')
$members.name: OpenWith

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Remove a registered `on` event * @memberof Menu * @access public * @this Menu * @param {Menu} menu {@link #Menu|Menu} to remove event for * @param {string} event Name of `on` event to remove * @param {string} uuid Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) of registered `on` event * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * local event_uuid = menu:On('open', function(m) * print('Menu is now open :D') * end) * * menu:RemoveOnEvent('open', event_uuid) */
$members.description: Type: `function` Remove a registered `on` event

params.description: Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) of registered `on` event
params.name: uuid

examples: local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native')local event_uuid = menu:On('open', function(m)   print('Menu is now open :D')end)menu:RemoveOnEvent('open', event_uuid)
$members.name: RemoveOnEvent

$members.comment: /** * Type: `function` * * Change menu's position * @memberof Menu * @access public * @param {Menu} menu Menu * @param {string} position * Menu position on screen * * * options: * * `topleft` | `topcenter` | `topright` | `centerleft` | `center` | `centerright` | `bottomleft` | `bottomcenter` | `bottomright` * @example * local menu = MenuV:CreateMenu('MenuV', 'Welcome to MenuV', 'topleft', 255, 0, 0, 'size-125', 'example', 'menuv', 'example_namespace', 'native') * * menu:SetPosition('bottomright') */
$members.description: Type: `function` Change menu's position

$members.comment: /** * Type: `event` * * Event will be triggered when item's value changed * @access public * @this Item * @event Item#update * @param {Item} item Current updated item * @param {string} key Current updated key * @param {any} value Current updated value * @param {any} oldValue Previous value * @example item:On('update', function(item, key, value, oldValue) print('You have updated this item :)') end) */
$members.name: update
$members.description: Type: `event` Event will be triggered when item's value changed
